item.description:
Come join us this Christmas! Everyone is invited to a party at my house in Wakefield.

Anyone can drop in any time after 5-ish. If you want to come earlier, that's fine too! I'll cook a turkey to pick at, and we could all bring some favorite covered dish and/or beverages. Maybe we could watch classic holiday movies or just hang out and laugh. If you wear a really ugly holiday sweater you might win a prize! Any good ideas? Post them on the message board! None of us have to be alone when we can share this day with a jolly group of friends!

debbie

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Christmas Open House
